docs.title: CapTech Interview Preparation
docs.text: Welcome to the CapTech Interview Preparation guide. Use the navigation to explore different sections.

docs.title: Technical Expertise and Problem Solving
docs.text:
• Project Migration: Led the migration of TIBCO BusinessWorks systems to .NET 6+ APIs, including complex coordination and technical adjustments for Kerberos authentication within a Kubernetes environment on AWS.
  • Technical Innovation: Developed a set of .NET libraries named LPL Commons, enhancing logging to ELK in ECS format and integrating caching with Redis, addressing several integration challenges to boost efficiency.
  • System Improvement: Enhanced the Fast Dashboard project by implementing an orchestration layer for efficient management of mergers and acquisitions, utilizing background processing and queuing with Hangfire to significantly improve system performance and reliability.

docs.title: Leadership and Teamwork
docs.text:
• Conflict Resolution: Successfully managed relationships with challenging team members by focusing on clear communication and conflict resolution, demonstrating strong interpersonal skills and leadership qualities.
  • Client Management: Established successful client relationships by understanding needs, maintaining open communication, and managing expectations, showcasing a client-focused mindset and effective communication skills.

docs.title: Professional Development and Industry Engagement
docs.text:
• Continuous Learning: Stayed current with industry trends and technologies through engagement with industry publications, online courses, and professional networks, applying new knowledge directly to work projects.
  • Time Management: Demonstrated ability to handle tight deadlines and manage multiple projects effectively through strategic prioritization, task breakdown, and open team communication.

docs.title: Why CapTech?
docs.text:
• Company Attraction: Attracted to CapTech due to its diverse client base, impressive consultant expertise, and professionalism observed during collaborations at LPL.
  • Career Goals Alignment: Excited about the opportunity to contribute to and grow with CapTech, aligning personal career goals with the company's culture, projects, and industry reputation.

docs.title: LPL Commons
docs.text: Developed .NET libraries for logging to ELK in ECS format, and interfaces for caching with Redis, DynamoDB, and S3 integration.

docs.title: TIBCO BusinessWorks Migration
docs.text: Led the migration of TIBCO BusinessWorks to .NET 6+ APIs, including configuring Kerberos authentication in a Kubernetes environment on AWS.

docs.title: Fast Dashboard
docs.text: Managed a team of five developers on a mergers and acquisitions application using Kubernetes, background processing with Hangfire, and in-memory queuing.

docs.title: Mock Interview Questions for CapTech Consulting
Challenging Project
docs.text:
• Highlight: Migrating TIBCO BusinessWorks to .NET 6+ APIs, focusing on Kerberos authentication in a Kubernetes/AWS environment.
  • Key Takeaway: Demonstrates leadership in technical coordination and problem-solving under pressure.

docs.title: Handling Tight Deadlines
docs.text:
• Highlight: Effective time management and communication.
  • Key Takeaway: Proven ability to stay organized and meet deadlines while maintaining team cohesion.

docs.title: Recent Technical Problem
docs.text:
• Highlight: Developing .NET libraries (LPL Commons) for logging and caching.
  • Key Takeaway: Shows expertise in .NET, problem-solving skills, and ability to enhance system efficiency.

docs.title: Working with Difficult Team Members
docs.text:
• Highlight: Emphasizes communication and conflict resolution.
  • Key Takeaway: Strong interpersonal skills and leadership in diverse team environments.

docs.title: Staying Current with Industry Trends
docs.text:
• Highlight: Continuous learning through industry publications, courses, and networks.
  • Key Takeaway: Commitment to professional development and applying new knowledge effectively.

docs.title: Client Management Approach
docs.text:
• Highlight: Understanding needs, open communication, and managing expectations.
  • Key Takeaway: Client-focused mindset and ability to deliver value through strong relationships.

docs.title: Improving Processes or Systems
docs.text:
• Highlight: Implementing background processing and queuing with Hangfire in the Fast Dashboard project.
  • Key Takeaway: Analytical skills and initiative in driving positive change and improving system reliability.

docs.title: Prioritizing Work Across Multiple Projects
docs.text:
• Highlight: Framework for assessing deadlines, importance, and resources.
  • Key Takeaway: Effective multitasking and organizational skills to deliver quality work.

docs.title: Interest in CapTech
docs.text:
• Highlight: Attracted by company culture, projects, and reputation. Excited about working with a diverse client base.
  • Key Takeaway: Genuine interest in the company and alignment with its values and goals.
